==What's new in version 2.0==

  # oracle-ddl2svn splitted on 2 project, scheme2ddl moved to new namespace com.googlecode.scheme2ddl
  # Fully rewritten code, build on top of spring-batch
  # Greatly improved perfomance with {{{--parallel <number>}}} option, 
  # scheme2ddl is now multithreaded!
  # Advansed xml config rewritten and simplyfied and now is not compatable with 1.x verision
  # New {{{--config <path_to_config>}}} option
  # fix a lot of issues from 1.x versions
